statements: SELECT * FROM CourseTimetables WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT course_name, classroom, time_slot FROM CourseTimetables WHERE student_id = 123456;
SELECT course_id, student_name FROM CourseTimetables WHERE student_availability = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM CourseTimetables WHERE course_id = 101 AND day_of_week = 'Friday';
SELECT student_name, classroom FROM CourseTimetables WHERE time_slot = 'Morning' AND student_availability = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM CourseTimetables WHERE student_id = 123 AND day_of_week = 'Monday'
SELECT course_id, classroom, time_slot FROM CourseTimetables WHERE student_availability = TRUE
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM CourseTimetables WHERE classroom = 'Room 101' ORDER BY time_slot DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_courses FROM CourseTimetables WHERE student_id > 100
SELECT DISTINCT classroom FROM CourseTimetables WHERE student_availability = FALSE
SELECT * FROM CoursePreferences
SELECT course_id, student_email, preference_rank FROM CoursePreferences
SELECT * FROM StudentAvailability WHERE start_time < '12:00:00'
SELECT student_id, day_of_week FROM StudentAvailability WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday'
SELECT student_id, start_time, end_time FROM StudentAvailability ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT * FROM CoursePreferences ORDER BY preference_rank DESC, course_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_email FROM CoursePreferences WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT course_id, student_email FROM CoursePreferences JOIN StudentAvailability ON CoursePreferences.student_email = StudentAvailability.student_id WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT student_email, SUM(preference_rank) AS total_rank FROM CoursePreferences GROUP BY student_email HAVING total_rank > 10;

SELECT student_email, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM CoursePreferences JOIN StudentAvailability ON CoursePreferences.student_email = StudentAvailability.student_id ORDER BY day_of_week, start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 75;
SELECT course_name, course_instructor FROM Courses;
SELECT student_id, course_id, preference_order FROM Preferences ORDER BY student_id, preference_order DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, course_instructor FROM Students JOIN Preferences ON Students.student_id = Preferences.student_id JOIN Courses ON Preferences.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students JOIN Preferences ON Students.student_id = Preferences.student_id
SELECT student_name, course_name, course_instructor FROM Students JOIN Preferences ON Students.student_id = Preferences.student_id JOIN Courses ON Preferences.course_id = Courses.course_id

SELECT student_name, student_grade, course_name, preference_order FROM Students JOIN Preferences ON Students.student_id = Preferences.student_id JOIN Courses ON Preferences.course_id = Courses.course_id ORDER BY preference_order DESC
SELECT course_name, COUNT(student_id) AS student_count FROM Preferences JOIN Courses ON Preferences.course_id = Courses.course_id GROUP BY course_name

SELECT course_name, AVG(student_grade) AS average_grade FROM Students JOIN Preferences ON Students.student_id = Preferences.student_id JOIN Courses ON Preferences.course_id = Courses.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING AVG(student_grade) > 80
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY course_time;
SELECT student_name, student_major FROM Student WHERE student_major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT student_id, course_id, preference_order FROM StudentPreferences WHERE preference_order > 2;
SELECT student_id, available_day, available_time FROM StudentAvailability ORDER BY student_id DESC, available_day ASC;
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_day = 'Monday';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Student WHERE student_major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT course_name, course_time, instructor_name FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY course_time DESC;

SELECT s.student_name, c.course_name FROM Student s INNER JOIN StudentPreferences sp ON s.student_id = sp.student_id INNER JOIN CourseSchedule c ON sp.course_id = c.course_id WHERE sp.preference_order = 1;

SELECT s.student_name, sa.available_day, sa.available_time, c.course_name FROM Student s INNER JOIN StudentAvailability sa ON s.student_id = sa.student_id INNER JOIN CourseSchedule c ON sa.available_day = c.course_day ORDER BY sa.available_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, course_time FROM Course ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Student WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Preference WHERE preference_score > 5 ORDER BY preference_id;
SELECT * FROM Availability WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' AND time_slot = '09:00:00';
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, course_time FROM Course ORDER BY course_time DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Student WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Availability WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' AND time_slot > '08:00:00';

SELECT Student.student_name, Course.course_name, Schedule.day_of_week FROM Student JOIN Schedule ON Student.student_id = Schedule.student_id JOIN Course ON Schedule.course_id = Course.course_id ORDER BY Schedule.day_of_week, Student.student_name DESC;
